title: Software Support in Inquiry-Based Learning: Mathematical Modeling Design

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational mathematical knowledge (functions, statistics, calculus concepts)
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based simple software tools, group collaborative learning environments, and mathematical inquiry for solving real-life problems

learning_goals: Students can collect real-world data and perform mathematical modeling using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can express relationships between variables as functions or statistical models according to inquiry questions.
Learners can validate and improve the validity of mathematical models through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
